mapper.select: select a.login_id as loginId , a.user_id as userId , F_WTM_AES_DECRYPT(a.login_id, #{encKey}) as empNo , F_WTM_AES_DECRYPT(a.enter_cd, #{encKey}) as enterCd , a.name as name , a.password as password from comm_user a where a.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and a.enter_cd = F_WTM_AES_ENCRYPT(#{enterCd}, #{encKey}) and a.login_id = F_WTM_AES_ENCRYPT(#{loginId}, #{encKey})
